description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::Model`` resource updates data model for a WebSocket API. For more information, see [Model Selection Expressions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-selection-expressions.html#apigateway-websocket-api-model-selection-expressions) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the model.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ContentType.description: The content-type for the model, for example, "application/json".
ContentType.markdownDescription:
The content-type for the model, for example, "application/json".

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Schema.description: The schema for the model. For application/json models, this should be JSON schema draft 4 model.
Schema.markdownDescription:
The schema for the model. For application/json models, this should be JSON schema draft 4 model.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

ApiId.markdownDescription:
The API identifier.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the model.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ModelId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
